snippet.title: Shadow of Loot Box - Release trailer
snippet.description:
Shadow of Loot Box is the first-person shooter about micropayments, loot boxes, cut content and everything we "love" in modern video games.

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/764590/
Site: http://statelysnail.com/
